name: NoTouchAirport
0:
”Alexa, ask No Touch Airport where can I get a taxi”
”Alexa, ask No Touch Airport where is the nearest Starbucks”
”Alexa, ask No Touch Airport where is the nearest charging station”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: no touch airport
des:
The world is undergoing a massive transformation from touch-based to touch-free solutions. NoTouch Airport skill is all about minimizing surface contact and getting the most out of simple voice commands. Enable this skill and get the answers to all your queries about our airport and associated services.

Commands: One can simply begin by saying: “Alexa, ask No Touch Airport” -

Where can I get a taxi?
Where can I get coffee?
Where can I get a pizza?
If the flights are on time?
Can I exchange currency?
Where is the nearest restroom?
Where is the nearest Starbucks?
Where is the nearest charging station?
Where is the Uber pickup area located?
Where is the conference center located?
Where is the best place to pick up someone?
Is there any post office or mail service available?

For example: “Alexa, ask No Touch Airport where is the nearest Starbucks?”

Skill Details:

This skill contains dynamic content.
Invocation Name: No Touch Airport
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
